## Pull Request Description

<!-- Describe your changes in detail here. -->

### Gemini Code Assist on GitHub
This repository has **Gemini Code Assist on GitHub** integrated for AI-powered code reviews. We highly encourage using it to get immediate feedback and summarize your changes:
- Leave a comment with `/gemini summary` to post a summary of the changes in the pull request.
- Leave a comment with `/gemini review` to get an immediate, in-depth code review from Gemini.

### Checklist
- [ ] I have verified my changes locally (e.g. `py_compile`, `terraform validate`).
- [ ] I have read the `CONTRIBUTING.md` guidelines.
- [ ] I have used `/gemini review` to self-review my changes (if applicable).
